campaigns.name: Ghosts of Mistbrooke Harbor
campaigns.description: Join the Tidal Waves, a group of capable privateers, for their adventures and espionage in The Ghosts of Mistbrooke Harbor. As told by DM Mumbley in the world of Khalbadia Prime.

campaigns.name: The Settlers Beyond the Witchlight
campaigns.description: Good Omens, the adventuring party from the realm of Oxomar, has journeyed into the fey domain of Prismeer to deliver it from the hands of the hourglass coven.

campaigns.name: The Event Horizon
campaigns.description: In a world of Warring Empires, where alliances are forged and dismantled at a whim of Kings, Bishops, and Khans, one small band of mutants stands against the machinations of a murderous cult and the demon lord they serve.

campaigns.name: USCSS Nostromo
campaigns.description: A Coriolis: The Third Horizon campaign ran by Eric.

campaigns.name: Tell No Tales of the Rime of the Frostmaiden
campaigns.description: Let's catch back up with Tell No Tales. Mumbles will be DMing Rime of the Frost Maiden using Fantasy Grounds. This will be a session to get everything set up and ready to go.

campaigns.name: The Party Sometimes Dies in the Forgotten Realms
campaigns.description: Daytrain is currently running Tomb of Annihilation using Roll20. Join The Party as they delve into The Tomb of the Nine Gods to thwart the schemes of Acererak!
